statements: DELETE FROM MaintenanceReminders WHERE mileage_interval >= 5000 AND last_notified_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM reminders WHERE task_name = 'Clean car';
DELETE FROM maintenance_log WHERE id = 10 AND vehicle_id = 5;
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE last_mileage > 5000 AND last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_name = 'Car A'
DELETE FROM reminders WHERE vehicle_id = '911d172c-23a0-4035-b0e2-9bbc7a2d8cb6' AND reminder_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE year < 2015 AND last_mileage > 100000;
